about_the_game:
The best miner in the Galaxy is back! Revisit the 3 original episodes in spectacular HD and guide Mylo through a brand new episode featuring new enemies, break away platforms and new biomes! Ramp up the excitement and compete against your friends on the online leaderboards, collect all 32 achievements and because we’re old school developers, there’s a Secret Level that’s quite revealing! Need even more adventure, well no problem, we are including a new in-game level editor via Steam Workshop so you can create as many new adventures you want and share them with everyone!





  • Help Mylo get that burger joint all over again by guiding him through the original 3 episodes in HD!
  • All new achievements will have you competing for that top position of the online leaderboard!
  • Unearth exciting adventures in the all new Crystal Caves Episode, with challenging puzzles, action oriented hazards and rewards, featuring sandworms, break away platforms and much more!
  • Be the first to earn all the achievements including discovering the “Secret of the Volcano”!
  • Challenge your friends to beat your own adventures using our built-in level editor from the Steam Workshop
  • New Difficulty levels, Cloud Saves, New OST in the classic style and finally get that damn hard crystal!



Modernizing the visuals of a classic game in HD in the mind of a gamer isn’t enough. A true remastering of a classic game must mean preserving everything that made the original game challenging, fun and addictive, well we did this and more with Crystal Caves by incorporating a new vibrant color pallet to the not only the gameplay action but the storyboard elements as well.








Let’s not forget about YOU being able to use all of these new assets that include interactive environment tiles to build your own adventure as well! With our easy to learn level editor, you will be designing your own crazy adventures and be able to share them with your friends, and even put in yet another impossibly hard to get crystal!




Stop reading about the fun and get busy having fun!

reviews:
“Crystal Caves HD is the new best remake ever, supplanting the terrific Castle of Illusion a few years back.”
Retronauts

“Nintendo owners are already spoiled with Super Mario Maker, for PC users if you’re looking for a 2D platformer title with (what I feel) well balanced difficulty, tight controls, and a level editor on the PC then Crystal Caves HD is a must get.”
Pixel Pop Network

“While it’s easy to get swamped by the many side-scrollers on the PC these days, be they old or new, this right here is a diamond in the rough.”
4/5 – VG Almanac
short_description: Return to the underground classic world of treasures and traps in the HD remake of Crystal Caves! Guide Mylo through puzzles and arcade challenges of your favorite episodes, then explore the whole new Episode loaded with all new puzzles, enemies, challenges, hazards and help Mylo get back home!
